name: liri_node_app
description: LIRI Bot is a CLI APP that utilizes the Spotify, IMDB and Bandsintown API and gives the user the option to search for a Song, a Movie or Band/Artist. When searching for a Song or Movie, the user will get info regarding that Song or Movie. When searching for a Band/Artist, the user will be given info regarding the upcoming performances. This is a simple APP to demonstrate the usage of the below technologies.
author: Inna Atamanova
